name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: A dystopian open-world RPG where you play as a mercenary in the neon-lit streets of Night City.

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: An epic story of outlaws and the Wild West, with breathtaking visuals and a deep narrative.

name: Elden Ring
description: A fantasy action RPG that blends the expertise of FromSoftware with a vast, open world and a rich lore.

name: Hogwarts Legacy
description: Step into the wizarding world and live out your own magical adventure as a young wizard at Hogwarts.

name: Among Us
description: A multiplayer social deduction game where players work together to complete tasks while trying to identify the Impostor.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: A mature, story-driven RPG featuring Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter on a quest to find his adopted daughter.

name: Baldur's Gate 3
description: A deep, story-rich RPG set in the Dungeons & Dragons universe with tactical combat and cooperative multiplayer.

name: Starfield
description: An open-world space exploration RPG where you create your own character and explore the galaxy.

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage
description: A return to the roots of the Assassin's Creed franchise with a stealth-focused action adventure set in Baghdad.

name: Resident Evil 4 Remake
description: A modernized remake of the classic survival horror game with overhauled graphics and gameplay.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III
description: A fast-paced military shooter with a gripping campaign and multiplayer modes.

name: Forza Horizon 5
description: An open-world racing experience set in beautiful landscapes with hundreds of cars.

name: Doom Eternal
description: An adrenaline-fueled first-person shooter where you battle demons across dimensions.

name: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
description: An intense, skill-based action game set in Sengoku Japan where death is only the beginning.

name: God of War
description: Follow Kratos and his son Atreus on a journey through Norse mythology.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: Explore a vast, open world in Link's most breathtaking adventure yet.

name: Final Fantasy VII Remake
description: A stunning reimagining of the RPG classic, featuring iconic characters and enhanced visuals.

name: Ghost of Tsushima
description: A breathtaking samurai adventure set in the open world of feudal Japan.

name: Hades
description: A roguelike dungeon crawler with an engaging storyline and fast-paced combat.

name: Half-Life: Alyx
description: A VR experience set between Half-Life and Half-Life 2, delivering cutting-edge gameplay.

name: Minecraft Java Bedrock Edition
description: An iconic sandbox game allowing players to create, explore, and survive in a blocky world.

name: Terraria
description: Dig, fight, explore, and build your way through endless adventures in this 2D sandbox world.

name: GTA V
description: Explore the sprawling open world of Los Santos with epic heists and dynamic missions.

name: Overwatch 2
description: A team-based hero shooter where teamwork and strategic play lead to victory.

name: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty
description: A massive story expansion for Cyberpunk 2077, featuring new characters and adventures.

name: Destiny 2: Lightfall
description: A sci-fi looter shooter with a thrilling campaign and massive cooperative battles.

name: Persona 5 Royal
description: Live the life of a high school student with a secret in this beloved JRPG classic.

name: Monster Hunter: World
description: Hunt massive monsters solo or with friends in an awe-inspiring open world.

name: Cuphead
description: A challenging side-scroller featuring retro visuals and imaginative boss battles.

name: Subnautica
description: Survive and explore an underwater alien world full of mysteries and dangers.

name: Battlefield 2042
description: The latest installment in the Battlefield series, featuring large-scale futuristic warfare.

name: Battlefield V
description: Experience World War II like never before with immersive multiplayer battles.

name: Battlefield 1
description: A dramatic World War I setting with massive multiplayer battles and stunning visuals.

name: Battlefield 4
description: Modern warfare with large-scale maps, dynamic destructible environments, and tactical gameplay.

name: Battlefield 3
description: A groundbreaking shooter with lifelike visuals and adrenaline-pumping gameplay.

name: Battlefield: Bad Company 2
description: A classic Battlefield experience with a memorable campaign and explosive multiplayer.

name: Battlefield 2
description: One of the defining games of modern tactical shooters with expansive battles.

name: Battlefield Hardline
description: A cops and robbers twist on the Battlefield series, focusing on urban combat and strategy.

name: Battlefield V: Definitive Edition
description: Includes all expansions, weapons, and skins for the ultimate WWII experience.

name: Battlefield 1: Revolution
description: The full Battlefield 1 experience with premium passes and DLC expansions.
